Reviews.Title: Good deal and average picture quality!!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Schutter
Reviews.Content: Worked just as stated.  Give decent video picture and are easy to use. Good deal and average picture quality thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: Gret product for the price
Reviews.Author: C. Cadeau "Rainy lake"
Reviews.Content: works great, no video issues for over a 60'+ cat5e run, a year plus and picture looks great! Good quality for the price, seems well made and fast ship as a Prime memeber.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Philip Carlin
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! Wire connection makes a very quick and clean installation! Vendor needs to have more product stocked by Amazon, lead time long when not stocked!
